metadata.name: The Floating City
metadata.description:
I brought you The Floating City, Had an adventurous 2.5 km trek upside a nearby hill named Shankaracharya. The view was breathtaking, at first didn't click any photo for first 30 minutes the view was so pleasing that I couldn't stop myself to feel.

Y'all might be thinking if this is a Drone shot. Hell na! Clicked this shot walking side by the ridge of the hill almost slipped from there but tried my best to get it.

I really lost in the beauty and calm. Felt refreshed, Revived and Relieved. So why should you keep yourself behind in feeling the same, resonate my moment with yours when you felt the same.
